tool_description: Extracts comprehensive player activity data from game databases for specified players and time ranges, including gameplay events, session information, and user attributes.

player_ids.description: List of unique player identifiers to extract data for

start_date.description: Start date for data extraction (ISO 8601 format)

end_date.description: End date for data extraction (ISO 8601 format)

include_events.description: Whether to include detailed gameplay events

data_format.description: Output format: raw, aggregated, or summary

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps.
Player ID limit exceeded: Maximum 10000 player IDs allowed per extraction.
Empty player list: At least one player ID must be provided.
Invalid data format: Must be one of [raw, aggregated, summary].
Database connection failed: Unable to access player data source.
usage: Provide player_ids array, start_date, and end_date. Optionally specify include_events and data_format. The tool returns structured player activity data for the specified time period.

total_players.description: Number of players with data extracted

data_points.description: Total number of data points collected

extraction_summary.description: Summary of the extraction process and data quality

player_data.description: Array of player data records in specified format
